title: The Two Mrs. Grenvilles
overview: Society grande dame Alice Grenville is appalled when her son marries Ann, an El Morocco showgirl. She snubs her unsuitable daughter-in-lawâ€¦until the young woman unloads a shotgun at what she claims is a prowler, but turns out to be her husband.Then Alice and her elite friends come to the rescue, protecting Ann from a murder charge rather than subject their moneyed circle to the unpleasantness of police and publicity.
